title: MorningBrief
description: Structured daily morning brief containing key updates, priorities, and reminders. All content must be factual, verifiable, and free from hallucinations or fabricated information.

date.description: The date of the morning brief in YYYY-MM-DD format. Do not hallucinate or fabricate dates.

summary.description: A concise overview of the day's most important information. Ensure all information is accurate and avoid hallucinations or unverified claims.

priorities.description: List of top priorities for the day.

items.description: A priority task or goal. Must be factual and not hallucinated.

key_updates.description: Important updates or developments since the last brief.

title.description: Short title of the update. Do not hallucinate or fabricate titles.

details.description: Detailed explanation of the update. Ensure all details are accurate and verifiable. Do not include hallucinated or fabricated information.

source.description: Optional source or reference link. If provided, must be real and verifiable. Do not hallucinate sources.

reminders.description: Any reminders, deadlines, or follow-ups for today.

items.description: A reminder item. Must be factual and not hallucinated.

time.description: Event time in HH:MM format. Do not hallucinate or fabricate times.

event.description: Description of the event. Must be factual and not hallucinated.

location.description: Optional location of the event. If provided, must be real and verifiable. Do not hallucinate locations.
